duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain relationships with new and existing clients to achieve sales goals.
Negotiate and close sales, overcoming objections to effectively communicate product value.
Utilize CRM software to track leads and manage client interactions throughout the sales process.
Generate leads through prospecting, cold calling, and networking activities.
Acquire new clients through effective communication and the demonstration of product knowledge.
Identify and prioritize potential clients to achieve efficient and targeted prospecting efforts.
